title: Scripters
body: Whats happening with these exploiters? Its quite unfair when people are legit trying to improve and then you get Scripters in your game making it hard for others to improve their game. The Scripter in my game even admitted to doing it.

replies.body: Wow apparently if you can dodge/hit skillshots you're scripting. Good to know.
It's easy to detect them in ARAM, the bots bang their heads on fallen turrets.

Lots of people admit to scripting, not as many actually do it...
I've personally been called a scripter three times so far (it's a little bit of an achievement in LoL :) ), heared it thrown around a few times, saw a couple guys claiming they were doing it, but i've seen someone that could've been legit scripting only... what, two times?
Both those times it turned out i was wrong, but apparently i met a real scripter in one of my games and never even noticed :P

TLDR If only it was that easy to detect a scripter.
